title: Quintessentially French Château Escape
description: Experience the unrivalled romance of the French countryside with a stay at the beautiful Château de Castel-Novel. Located amid 99 acres of stunning grounds, the property sits at the crossroads of the Dordogne, Limousin and Quercy regions, making it perfect for exploring the southwest of France. Included in your stay is a daily breakfast plus a welcome cocktail and fresh chef-made pastries in your room on arrival.
